entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Killarney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:03 a.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow with a few thunderstorms ending this afternoon then clearing. Local blowing snow this morning and early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:14 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 8:14 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:14 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 8:14 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. High 7. Forecast issued 8:14 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 8:14 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 1. Forecast issued 8:14 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Windy. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 8:14 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. High 8. Forecast issued 8:14 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 8:14 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Windy. High zero. Forecast issued 8:14 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 8:14 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 3. Forecast issued 8:14 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
